metadata.Title: CVE-2023-40577 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: Alertmanager handles alerts sent by client applications such as thePrometheus server. An attacker with the permission to perform POST requestson the /api/v1/alerts endpoint could be able to execute arbitraryJavaScript code on the users of Prometheus Alertmanager. This issue hasbeen fixed in Alertmanager version 0.2.51.

criterions.comment: prometheus-alertmanager package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
